title: PC February 27 - Meloni, representing Italian imperialism, meets Zelensky in Kiev to continue to feed the war by prosecutor and sign "bilateral agreements" for the "reconstruction"
content:
Two years after the outbreak of theguerrafor Prosecutorbetween Russian imperialism and US/born imperialism and of the European Union, Ukraine continues to be the vehicle, thepawn interestedto the division of the booty that can come from the clash between the Imperialist countries, in fact, which must give an outlet to the economic crisis world through the conquest of the markets, to guarantee the continuation of enormous profits necessary for the survival of the capitalist-imperialist bourgeois system.

On February 24, in fact, i representatives of the various imperialist countries gathered once again in Ukraine, with the Meloni warflower in the front row because currently at Presidency of the G7 shift. The ceremonies for the two years of war have started Yesterday at Antonov airport, where Meloni did not miss the opportunity to tell Bales and propaganda on the "nation" ...

"The goal" of the initiative, he comments An article of yesterday's manifesto, “while the third year of war begins, is say aloud thatThe allies do not abandon Ukraine"." Given the continuous complaints of Zelenskj. But since the aforementioned offensive of Spring of the Nazi Zelenskj did not succeed, on the contrary, saw the advance of the Russi, then "nobody is safer on the future of events". Well yes they also extend the times for the adhesion of Ukraine to the EU, despite the Promises: "Pacified Ukraine will be part of the EU" said the president of the European Commission with the helmet von der Leyen. " When it will be part of the EU exactly does not know, in the meantime you can continue to destroy, In short, the war can continue on all the land by putting on the field Other "aid": “On the 88 billion of EU financing paid so far, 28 are military assistance states and 5 others are provided for the assistance fund common, for the purchase of weapons and ammunition, in addition to the training of 60 thousand Ukrainian soldiers. "

The words used by the impassive representatives of imperialism - against the background of thousands of deaths - However, they remain vague on the direct explicit commitment regarding the war. These bilateral agreements, as the Manifesto writes, "involve a" guarantee security »", and what does it mean? It is “a commitment to intervene to Support of Ukraine beyond what has been done so far? It's a replacement of article 5 of NATO "which provides for the entry into the war if a Is it attacked ally? But “the EU is well careful not to go beyond the line Red that could drag the block into a state of "co-co-belligorate" ".

Therefore, what they really consist of These bilateral agreements - while pushing towards a generalized enlargement of the war - that Meloni for Italy also, as they had before they did great Brittany, Germany, France, Denmark and Canada, signed in the building Mariinsky?

"The Italian agreement explained Meloni, it concernsIndustrial cooperation, the exchanges of the services of intelligence on cyber attacks,support for reforms,humanitarian,later the reconstruction. "

And in the end he concludes with a sentence Effect: "Italy provides" unpublished and strengthened collaboration in case of future attack »." It is a phrase that does not mean anything, since What was to be said on this occasion was said by any representative of the imperialist bourgeoisie present, if not thatwill increase Aid in cash, in arms and in military training.
